mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER (email, name, nickname, pwd, birth, approval_status, approval_key) values(#{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{pwd}, #{birth}, 'false', #{approval_key})
mapper.select: select count(*) from MEMBER where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set approval_status = 'true' where email = #{email} and approval_key = #{approval_key}
update MEMBER set pwd = #{pwd} where email = #{email}
mapper.delete: delete from MEMBER where email = #{email} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname} where email = #{email}
